thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Steve Thornton

author: Steve Thornton
title: Steve Thornton
text: Trusted Housesitters works very effectively for both house owners and house sitters. It is easy to use as new listings appear twice a day, the system is user-friendly for both parties, and if one wants to ask a question, the Trusted Housesitters team can be contacted 24 hours a day. We are thoroughly enjoying the professionalism and efficiency of this company.
